entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY LATE THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
